name: Pokiyo (Real name of the game was over the limit)
name_original: Pokiyo (Real name of the game was over the limit)
description:
You are playing the game "I have been suppressed by society for too long as a former gamer, now it is time for me to magically travel to another world to become so powerful that I beat the most powerful of the powerful, which makes me really powerful." An interactive Novel made on Twine!

This is a student Project that is made for the purpose of translating our Card/Board game into a digital game made by James He.
